cab.content: Prom: General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To: C.I.G.3.,T:ar Office *Despatched 2.40 a.m. 25.12*17. Received 12.30 p.m. 25^12.17.10071. Dec.24th cipher.The following is the situation this evening :-5rd Army. A battalion of Bersaglieri early this morning made surprise attack and cleared enemy from right bank of Piave at Ga Lunga. On the rest of the front the situation is normal.4th Army. Situation unchanged.1st Army. By the evening the enemy, as a result of yesterday1s operations had captured Mount Melago Col del Rosso. Italians counter-attacked with success this morn-Ing and latest reports indicate that they are now on line Costalunga - Busa del Termine Ca di Melago, C. Caporai, southern slopes of Col Dechele Grulli. Fighting to recapture summit of Col del Rosso which Is still held by the enemy, continues.3rd Corps. No change.
